short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change background color, font color & font size on any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a project for a SE 3400 class. The extension features a dropdown menu that allows the user to customize and change their background and font color and font size.
